mapper.select: SELECT a.CommunityID, a.CommunityTitle, b.Name, a.Content, a.Views, a.Likes, a.CreatedTime ,b.Position FROM communities a INNER JOIN employees b ON a.AuthorEmployeeID = b.EmployeeID order by CreatedTime desc limit #{param1},#{param2}
mapper.update: update communities set Views=Views+1 where CommunityID=#{param1}
